guideCaptionDesc: To use the subtitle translation feature, please enable Live Captions in Google Meet:
guideCaptionStep1: Press the CC (Closed Captions) button on the bottom control bar
guideCaptionStep3: Wait for captions to appear, then try again
guideCaptionDescV2: To use the subtitle translation feature, you need to enable Live Captions in Google Meet first.
guideCaptionStep1Desc: Press the CC (Closed Captions) button on the bottom control bar of Google Meet
guideCaptionStep2Desc: You can press the <kbd>C</kbd> key on your keyboard to quickly toggle Live Captions
guideCaptionStep3Desc: Captions will appear when someone is speaking in the meeting. Then, press the Translate button again to start.
guideCaptionVisualDesc: Location of the CC button in the Google Meet control bar
guideCaptionInfo: Note: Live Captions only work when someone is speaking in the meeting. If you don't see captions, wait for someone to speak or try speaking yourself.
guideCaptionEnableSuccess: Enabled Live Captions! Please wait for captions to appear.
simpleGuideDesc: To use the subtitle translation feature, please enable Live Captions in Google Meet:
simpleGuideStep1: 1. Press the CC (Closed Captions) button on the bottom control bar
simpleGuideStep3: 3. Wait for captions to appear, then try again
simpleGuideNote: Note: Live Captions only work when someone is speaking in the meeting.
guideTeamsDesc: To translate subtitles, you need to enable Live Captions in Microsoft Teams first.
guideTeamsStep1Desc: Press the "..." (More) button on the Teams control bar.
guideTeamsStep2Desc: In the menu, find and select "Turn on live captions".
guideTeamsStep3Desc: Teams might ask for the spoken language. Please select the correct language (e.g., English).
guideTeamsInfo: Note: Captions will only appear when someone is speaking. After enabling, wait for someone to talk.
guideTeamsEnableSuccess: Sent request to enable captions! Please wait...
guideTeamsEnableError: Could not find the "..." (More) button. Please try enabling manually.
simpleGuideTeamsDesc: To use the translation feature, please enable live captions in Teams:
simpleGuideTeamsStep1: 1. Press the "..." (More actions) button in the control bar.
simpleGuideTeamsStep3: 3. (If asked) Select the spoken language (e.g., English).
simpleGuideTeamsStep4: 4. Wait for captions to appear, then press the Translate button again.
systemContextSavedSearch: üîç Context saved: "%text%...". You can ask questions about this content.
systemContextSavedChat: üìå Context saved: "%text%...". You can ask questions about this content.
errorInvalidAIJSON: Received invalid JSON structure from AI.
ttsSpeedSliderTitle: Drag the slider to adjust reading speed (will restart reading).
errorWebSpeechNotSupported: Browser does not support Web Speech API.
promptTranslateTitle: You are a professional translation AI. Translate the Title and Description below into %langName%.
promptTranslateReq1: Keep the HTML formatting of the 'description'.
promptTranslateReq2: Only translate the text content, not the HTML tags.
promptRewriteDescTitle: Rewrite the following DESCRIPTION into a professional meeting invitation email.
promptRewriteDescReq3: State the reason, main content (based on the original text).
promptRewriteDescReq4: End with a call to action (e.g., Please confirm your attendance) and a closing (e.g., Thank you/Regards).
promptRewriteDefaultContext: %context% to be better, more professional, and more concise.
promptRewriteTitle: You are a professional and creative AI writing assistant.
promptRewriteRule: ONLY return the rewritten content. Do not add any explanations, greetings, or "Here is..."

errorNoConfig: No model config was sent from the popup
errorInvalidProviderModelId: Invalid providerId or modelId extracted from: %fullModelId%

errorApi404: Error 404: Model "%modelId%" does not exist or Base URL is incorrect.
errorApiExtractContent: Could not extract content from API response.
errorRaceModeFailed: All models failed in Racing Mode.
errorModelNotSupportImages: This AI model does not support file attachments (images, documents, etc.). Please try again without attaching files, or select another model that supports file attachments.
errorModelNotSupportImagesRaceMode: All selected models do not support file attachments (images, documents, etc.). Please try again without attaching files, or select other models that support file attachments.

errorTestRaceMissing: Missing test content or model list.
errorJsonInvalid: AI returned an invalid JSON format.
promptSummarizeSystem: You are a professional and efficient email summarization assistant.
promptSummarizeUser:
Summarize the content of the following email thread, retaining the important key points: 

%text%
promptComposeSystem: You are a professional, polite, and to-the-point email writing assistant.
promptComposeUser:
Original email (context): 
"%context%"

Request: Please compose a reply email based on the following key points: "%prompt%"
promptQuerySystem: You are a helpful AI assistant specializing in answering questions based on the provided context. Answer concisely and accurately.
promptQueryUser:
Based on the following EMAIL CONTEXT: 

--- CONTEXT ---
%context%
--- END CONTEXT ---

Please answer the following QUESTION: "%query%"
promptTranslateSystem: You are a professional and accurate translation assistant that preserves the original text's formatting (like line breaks).
promptTranslateUser:
Translate the following text into %targetLangName%. Return only the translated content, without any explanations:

%text%

accountDesc: This information is synced from your Google account.
serverModeDesc: Choose to execute AI locally or on server to secure API keys.
serverModeWarning: When enabled, all AI requests will be sent to server. API keys will not be stored on extension.
serverUrlDesc: URL of the AI processing server. Example: https://api.example.com
serverFallbackLabel: Auto fallback to Local if Server fails
serverFallbackDesc: If server doesn't respond, automatically switch to local execution.
responseModeDesc: Select the default AI model or enable "Racing Mode" to increase response speed.
responseModeSubDesc: Choose how the extension calls the AI. This setting applies to all features.
defaultModelLabel: Default Model (when Race Mode is off)
defaultModelPlaceholder: Please add a model in the configuration pages...
defaultModelDesc: This model will be used if "Racing Mode" is disabled.
raceModeDesc: Send requests to multiple models simultaneously and get the answer from the fastest one. (Uses more API)
raceModelSelectDesc: Select 2 to 4 models. Only models with a configured API Key will appear here.
raceModelErrorNone: Please add and configure API Keys for at least 2 models.
raceTestDesc: Send a request to ALL models you selected above to see their response speed (latency) and status.
